used: That which cannot be expressed by speech, but by which speech is expressed, know that alone to be Brahman. — Kena Upanishad 1.5
Compassion is the bridge that connects all hearts.
Gratitude turns ordinary days into blessings.
Silence is where the soul speaks most clearly.
As one lamp lights another, knowledge is passed from teacher to disciple. — Chandogya Upanishad 7.26.2
